bibl.title: The Michaelides Manuscript Collection.
bibl.note: Deals with the current location of part of the collection, and appeals for information on manuscripts which are not now in the British Library (BL), British Museum (BM) or Cambridge University Library (CUL). - Pp. 225-226: Michaelides Greek Manuscripts in CUL (about 100, of which 6 1/2 published in P. Michael.); - Michaelides Greek Manuscripts in the BL (24 1/2, published in P. Michael.); - Addendum [Papyrological Institute at Leiden] (1, published in P. Michael. - possibly more, published in Pap. Lugd.-Bat.).
bibl.seg: CLACKSON Sarah J., The Michaelides Manuscript Collection.

Deals with the current location of part of the collection, and appeals for information on manuscripts which are not now in the British Library (BL), British Museum (BM) or Cambridge University Library (CUL). - Pp. 225-226: Michaelides Greek Manuscripts in CUL (about 100, of which 6 1/2 published in P. Michael.); - Michaelides Greek Manuscripts in the BL (24 1/2, published in P. Michael.); - Addendum [Papyrological Institute at Leiden] (1, published in P. Michael. - possibly more, published in Pap. Lugd.-Bat.).
